title: Miscellaneous Functions Under Construction
text: UtopiaPlanitia R package store miscellaneous functions ’m process constructing validating. Currently includes variable importance functions causal machine learning applications, tests treatment effect heterogeneity, associated visualizations.

title: Miscellaneous Functions Under Construction
text: can install development version UtopiaPlanitia GitHub : ```r # install.packages(“pak”) pak::pak(“CetiAlphaFive/UtopiaPlanitia”)

what: Modified LOCO Variable Importance for Causal Forests — cf_loco
title: Modified LOCO Variable Importance for Causal Forests — cf_loco
text: Computes variable importance causal forests using method : https://arxiv.org/abs/2006.16763

title: Modified LOCO Variable Importance for Causal Forests — cf_loco
code: cf_loco(   c.forest,   variable.groups = NULL,   group.by.corr = FALSE,   corr.threshold = 0.5,   seed = 1234 )

title: Modified LOCO Variable Importance for Causal Forests — cf_loco
text: c.forest fitted causal forest object grf package. variable.groups list variable groups. element list contain variable names group. group..corr logical indicating whether group variables correlation. Default FALSE. corr.threshold numeric value 0 1 indicating correlation threshold grouping variables. Default 0.5. seed integer seed reproducibility.

title: Modified LOCO Variable Importance for Causal Forests — cf_loco
text: numeric vector variable importance scores normalized sum 1.

title: Compute Variable Importance — compute_vimp
text: Computes variable importance coefficients alpha retrained forest, centered outcome treatment assignment, original oob predictions.

title: Compute Variable Importance — compute_vimp
Compute Variable Importance — compute_vimp
text: alpha Coefficients alpha retrained forest. Y.centered Centered outcome. W.centered Centered treatment assignment. tau.hat Original --bag predictions.

title: Compute Variable Importance — compute_vimp
text: numeric value representing variable importance.

what: Left-hand permutation for feature importance — left_perm
title: Left-hand permutation for feature importance — left_perm
text: Computes feature importance causal forest using left-hand permutation

title: Left-hand permutation for feature importance — left_perm
code: left_perm(   forest,   var_select = colnames(forest$X.orig),   n_perm = 100,   n_cv = 100 )

title: Left-hand permutation for feature importance — left_perm
text: forest fitted causal forest object grf package. var_select character vector variable names assess. Default column names original feature matrix. n_perm integer specifying number permutations. Default 100. n_cv integer specifying number cross-validation runs. Default 100.

title: Left-hand permutation for feature importance — left_perm
text: list containing summary data frame results data frame plotting.

title: Omnibus Tests of Heterogeneity — omni_hetero
text: Performs various heterogeneity tests fitted causal forest model.

title: Omnibus Tests of Heterogeneity — omni_hetero
Omnibus Tests of Heterogeneity — omni_hetero
text: c.forest fitted causal forest object grf package.

title: Omnibus Tests of Heterogeneity — omni_hetero
text: data frame summarizing results heterogeneity tests, including test names, estimates, p-values, whether heterogeneity detected.

title: Omnibus Tests of Heterogeneity — omni_hetero
code: if (FALSE) { cf_model <- causal_forest(X, Y, W) summary_results <- omni_hetero(cf_model) print(summary_results) }

what: Interaction Plot for Causal Forest — plot_inter
title: Interaction Plot for Causal Forest — plot_inter
text: Generates interaction plot causal forest model.

title: Interaction Plot for Causal Forest — plot_inter
code: plot_inter(   c.forest,   x_var,   y_var,   bin_count = 50,   limits = c(min(c.forest$predictions), max(c.forest$predictions)) )

title: Interaction Plot for Causal Forest — plot_inter
text: c.forest fitted causal forest model object grf package. x_var name variable plotted x-axis. y_var name variable plotted y-axis. bin_count Number bins hexagonal binning. Default 50. limits limits color scale, default minimum maximum CATEs.

title: Interaction Plot for Causal Forest — plot_inter
text: ggplot2 object interaction plot.

title: Interaction Plot for Causal Forest — plot_inter
code: if (FALSE) { cf_model <- causal_forest(X, Y, W) inter_plot(cf_model, x_var = "X1", y_var = "X2") }

what: Partial Dependence Plot for Causal Forest — plot_pdp
title: Partial Dependence Plot for Causal Forest — plot_pdp
text: Generates partial dependence plot causal forest model.

title: Partial Dependence Plot for Causal Forest — plot_pdp
code: plot_pdp(   c.forest,   x_var,   curve_fitter = TRUE,   method = "loess",   show_ate_region = TRUE )

title: Partial Dependence Plot for Causal Forest — plot_pdp
text: c.forest fitted causal forest model object grf package. x_var name variable plotted x-axis. curve_fitter Logical indicating whether include curve fitter. Default TRUE. method smoothing method used geom_smooth curve_fitter TRUE. Default "loess". show_ate_region Logical indicating whether show ATE region (confidence interval). Default TRUE.

title: Partial Dependence Plot for Causal Forest — plot_pdp
text: ggplot2 object partial dependence plot.

title: Partial Dependence Plot for Causal Forest — plot_pdp
code: if (FALSE) { cf_model <- causal_forest(X, Y, W) pdp_plot(cf_model, x_var = "X1") }

what: Plot Variable Importance Scores from Permutation Analysis — plot_perm
title: Plot Variable Importance Scores from Permutation Analysis — plot_perm
text: Plots distribution variable importance scores left_perm function.

title: Plot Variable Importance Scores from Permutation Analysis — plot_perm
Plot Variable Importance Scores from Permutation Analysis — plot_perm
text: perm_results list containing output left_perm function, including plot_df data frame.

title: Plot Variable Importance Scores from Permutation Analysis — plot_perm
text: ggplot2 object showing distribution variable importance scores.
